title: I love league of legends :)
body: Why are there so many %%%%s playing janna with exhaust now

replies.body: You are absolutely correct friend! Exhaust needs to go! I love league of legends no matter what though :)
beacuase it works? because she's easy and some people dont like playing support and get forced into the role so they pick an easy support?

Ardent meta is aids. back before the ardent and ancient coin rework and everyone started taking gold runes and rushing ardent over sightstone or upgrading the gold item, I used to do mad things like roaming to gank mid at lvl4 or invade the jungle.

You just can't play aggressively as janna anymore. The alternatives is just too polarising. 

So as an elegy to how janna became a disgrace, I am currently using her as hybrid dps toplane.
Because it's a much better idea for them to run out into lane and die?

Because Exhaust is a Summoner Spell? If you don't like it then clearly they're doing something right.

It's designed to hurt ADC's for a reason.
Ha, you won't see me playing Janna with heal or ignite in soloqueue. Team needs exhaust.

Hey there's no need to be rude. Personally I feel the ardent censer rush strategy is obsolete on the current patch (especially in solo queue!). Even more so if the enemy mid laner is an assasin like Zed or Talon. So no, I'm not taking heal to complement your barrier.

Exhaust is much better at the moment.
